00010 char *
00011 util_path_search(char *prog)
00012 {
00013 #ifdef UNIX
00014     return util_file_search(prog, getenv("PATH"), "x");
00015 #else
00016     return util_file_search(prog, NIL(char), "x");
00017 #endif
00018 }
00019 
00020 
00021 char *
00022 util_file_search(
00023   char *file,                   /* file we're looking for */
00024   char *path,                   /* search path, colon separated */
00025   char *mode                    /* "r", "w", or "x" */)
00026 {
00027     int quit;
00028     char *buffer, *filename, *save_path, *cp;
00029 
00030     if (path == 0 || strcmp(path, "") == 0) {
00031         path = ".";             /* just look in the current directory */
00032     }
00033 
00034     save_path = path = strsav(path);
00035     quit = 0;
00036     do {
00037         cp = strchr(path, ':');
00038         if (cp != 0) {
00039             *cp = '\0';
00040         } else {
00041             quit = 1;
00042         }
00043 
00044         /* cons up the filename out of the path and file name */
00045         if (strcmp(path, ".") == 0) {
00046             buffer = strsav(file);
00047         } else {
00048             buffer = ALLOC(char, strlen(path) + strlen(file) + 4);
00049             (void) sprintf(buffer, "%s/%s", path, file);
00050         }
00051         filename = util_tilde_expand(buffer);
00052         FREE(buffer);
00053 
00054         /* see if we can access it */
00055         if (check_file(filename, mode)) {
00056             FREE(save_path);
00057             return filename;
00058         }
00059         FREE(filename);
00060         path = ++cp;
00061     } while (! quit); 
00062 
00063     FREE(save_path);
00064     return 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 static int
00069 check_file(char *filename, char *mode)
00070 {
00071 #ifdef UNIX
00072     int access_mode = /*F_OK*/ 0;
00073 
00074     if (strcmp(mode, "r") == 0) {
00075         access_mode = /*R_OK*/ 4;
00076     } else if (strcmp(mode, "w") == 0) {
00077         access_mode = /*W_OK*/ 2;
00078     } else if (strcmp(mode, "x") == 0) {
00079         access_mode = /*X_OK*/ 1;
00080     }
00081     return access(filename, access_mode) == 0;
00082 #else
00083     FILE *fp;
00084     int got_file;
00085 
00086     if (strcmp(mode, "x") == 0) {
00087         mode = "r";
00088     }
00089     fp = fopen(filename, mode);
00090     got_file = (fp != 0);
00091     if (fp != 0) {
00092         (void) fclose(fp);
00093     }
00094     return got_file;
00095 #endif
00096 }
